name: Inquiry & Discovery
description: The process starts when you reach out. We learn about your brand, goals, audience, and vision. This stage allows us to understand your needs and determine how our services can deliver maximum impact.

name: Strategy & Proposal
description: Based on the discovery, we craft a tailored strategy and outline a plan of action. This includes content concepts, deliverables, timelines, and investment. We ensure alignment with your brand objectives before moving forward.

name: Creative Planning & Production
description: Once approved, our team moves into full creative execution. For photography, videography, or digital content, this involves storyboarding, shooting, and designing assets. Every step is guided by the strategy to ensure both creativity and performance.

name: Review & Refinement
description: We present drafts or proofs for your feedback. This stage ensures your vision is reflected, and adjustments are made before final delivery.

name: Delivery & Distribution Support
description: Final assets are delivered in formats ready for digital platforms, print, or campaigns. If applicable, we also provide guidance or support for distribution and performance optimization.

name: Performance Tracking & Ongoing Partnership
description: For services like social media and performance marketing, we monitor results, provide analytics, and recommend optimizations. Many clients choose to continue with retainer packages to maintain consistent growth and brand storytelling.
